detail_desc: Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Calf-length, pull-on trousers in a cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a frill trim at the top and decorative bow at the front. Small embroidered motif below the waistband, a fake fly, side pockets and gently tapered legs.

Calf-length, pull-on trousers in a cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a frill trim at the top and decorative bow at the front. Small embroidered motif below the waistband, a fake fly, side pockets and gently tapered legs.

Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Set with a top in soft cotton jersey and a pair of pull-on trousers in woven fabric. Top with flutter sleeves and a print motif on the front. Trousers with an all-over print, covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Set with a top in soft cotton jersey and a pair of pull-on trousers in woven fabric. Top with flutter sleeves and a print motif on the front. Trousers with an all-over print, covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and matching pair of shorts in soft cotton. Classic T-shirt in solid colour jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts in a patterned weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.

Set with a T-shirt and matching pair of shorts in soft cotton. Classic T-shirt in solid colour jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts in a patterned weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in pleated jersey with short cap sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges around the sleeves and hems.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and sewn-on belt with a metal buckle at the front. Extended waistband with a concealed button, a zip fly and a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Suit trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a regular waist and extended waistband with a metal detail. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets with a concealed zip, fake back pockets and slim, tapered legs.
Santa hat with reversible sequins, and a faux fur pompom and trim.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined, sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton corduroy with a round neckline, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Lined in marled organic cotton jersey.

Skirt in two tiers of sequined tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and tiered layers of tulle with dangling sequins. Lined in woven fabric with a slight sheen.
A-line dress in glittery tulle with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, cap sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Dress in patterned cotton chambray with a collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a tie detail at the front and elastication at the back, discreet side pockets and a flared skirt. Unlined.
